item.itunes:author: Quarterback Factory Show
item.title: Episode 40: Joel Embiid MVP
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 40: Joel Embiid MVP
item.itunes:summary: Episode 40: Joel Embiid MVP - SIXERS: HUGE OT WIN over the Jazz! What’s your expectations and predictions for the second half of the season? FLYERS: Live commentary as we face off with the bitch-ass Pens. PHILLIES: Thoughts on Odubul playing, and spring training. EAGLES: Draft talk and rumor mill, goodbye Cam Johnston, Carson Wentz’ South Jersey home listing, and more randomness. LEAVE A COMMENT-- Follow us on Instagram and twitter @qbfactoryshow -- Call the QBFS Stress Line™ 215-436-9389 and leave a message, we will play it on air ---- Visit our blog at https://blog.qbfactory.show, and other thoughts and rants of current Philly sports by your favorite group of die hard 4 for 4 fans. -- Email(for business inquiries only):contact@qbfactory.show -...

item.itunes:author: Quarterback Factory Show
item.title: Carson Hurts No More
item.itunes:subtitle: Carson Hurts No More
item.itunes:summary: Carson Hurts No More - CARSON WENTZ IS GONE!! We emotionally break it down, no science, no analytics, just pure heartfelt, die-hard passion of your favorite Eagles fans with a platform! We play our Stress Line segment later, if you want to have your voice heard on our show, call 215-436-9389 and leave a message! Visit our blog at https://blog.qbfactory.show, and other thoughts and rants of current Philly sports by your favorite group of die hard 4 for 4 fans. -- Email(for business inquiries only):contact@qbfactory.show -...
